body_html:
Also master code will fail when using cell(), I'm don't know how to workaround.

for i in range(max_steps):    

  with tf.variable_scope("RNN", reuse=True if i > 0 else None):    

    (output, state) = self.cell(last_symbol, state)

ValueError: Variable seq2seq/run/decode/RNN/lstm_cell/weights does not exist, or was not created with tf.get_variable(). Did you mean to set reuse=None in VarScope?

body:
Also master code will fail when using cell(), I'm don't know how to workaround. 

    
    for i in range(max_steps):    

      with tf.variable_scope("RNN", reuse=True if i > 0 else None):    

        (output, state) = self.cell(last_symbol, state)  
ValueError: Variable seq2seq/run/decode/RNN/lstm_cell/weights does not exist, or was not created with tf.get_variable(). Did you mean to set reuse=None in VarScope?
